thread.title: ECIL Recruitment 2017 – Walk in for Senior Artisan Posts
thread.title_full: ECIL Recruitment 2017 – Walk in for Senior Artisan Posts

author: publisher12
title: ECIL Recruitment 2017 – Walk in for Senior Artisan Posts

organizations.name: electronics/ electrical/ radio mechanic/ instrumentation/ fitter/ sheet metal/ painter

text: ECIL Recruitment 2017 – Walk in for Senior Artisan Posts ECIL Recruitment 2017 – Walk in for Senior Artisan Posts: Electronics Corporation of India Limited (ECIL) has announced a notification for the recruitment of Senior Artisan vacancies on contract basis. Eligible candidates may attend for walk in interview on 28-01-2017 between 09:30 Hrs to 14:00 Hrs. Other details like age, qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… ECIL Vacancy Details: Total No of Posts: 24 Name of the Post: Senior Artisan Name of the Departments: 2. Mechanical: 05 Posts 3. Painter: 01 Post Age Limit: Candidates upper age should be 35 years as on 31-12-2016. Age relaxation is applicable by 5 years for SC/ ST 3 years for OBC & 10 more years for PH Candidates as per rules. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess ITI in Electronics/ Electrical/ Radio Mechanic/ Instrumentation/ Fitter/ Sheet Metal/ Painter with relevant experience. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may attend for walk in interview along with application in prescribed format, all original certificates in support of date of birth, qualification, experience, caste, one set of photocopies and recent passport size colour photograph on 28-01-2017 between 09:30 Hrs to 14:00 Hrs. Important Dates: Date & Time of Interview: 28-01-2017 between 09:30 Hrs to 14:00 Hrs. Venue: Concerned venue as given in the notification. For more details like venue, qualification, experience, pay, vacancy details & other information click on the link given below…
